metadata.name: Toshiro Gallery Piece - PR Edition
metadata.description:
This is a special 1-of-1 derivation of Miyamoto Toshiro, legendary sword saint from Japan, a character created by LightningWorks' upcoming CLAN series,It's drawn by Marvel artist DG Franchin with unique edits by LightningWorks founder Geoff McCabe.

This particular NFT was created exclusively for San Juan, Puerto Rico
